```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
Sys.setlocale(locale = "lt_LT.UTF-8")
source("../R/functions.R")
```

```{r}

vcfd <- read.csv("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/ffb0a5bfa58847f79bf2bc544980f4b6_0.csv") 
dlv <- read.csv("../data/lt-covid19-vaccine-deliveries.csv") %>% mutate(day = ymd(day))
```

```{r}
dlv1 <- dlv %>% group_by(vaccine_name) %>% summarise(vaccines_arrived  = sum(vaccines_arrived, na.rm = TRUE), vaccines_allocated = sum(vaccines_allocated, na.rm = TRUE))

d1 <- vcfd %>% count(vaccine_name = vacc_type_1) %>% rename(first_dose = n)
d2 <- vcfd %>% filter(vacc_type_2!="") %>% count(vaccine_name = vacc_type_2) %>% rename(second_dose = n)
da <- d1 %>% left_join(d2) %>% mutate(used = first_dose+second_dose)

avd <- da %>% left_join(dlv1) %>% mutate(unallocated = vaccines_arrived- vaccines_allocated, unused = vaccines_allocated - used, p = round(100*unused/vaccines_allocated,2))

```

```{r}
dlv1 <- dlv %>% group_by(vaccine_name) %>% summarise(vaccines_arrived  = sum(vaccines_arrived, na.rm = TRUE), vaccines_allocated = sum(vaccines_allocated, na.rm = TRUE))

d1 <- vcfd %>% count(vaccine_name = vacc_type_1) %>% rename(first_dose = n)
d2 <- vcfd %>% filter(vacc_type_2!="") %>% count(vaccine_name = vacc_type_2) %>% rename(second_dose = n)
da <- d1 %>% left_join(d2) %>% mutate(used = first_dose+second_dose)

avd <- da %>% left_join(dlv1) %>% mutate(unallocated = vaccines_arrived- vaccines_allocated, unused = vaccines_allocated - used, p = round(100*unused/vaccines_allocated,2))

```

```{r}

d1c <- vcfd %>% mutate(day = ymd(ymd_hms(vacc_date_1))) %>% group_by(day,vaccine_name = vacc_type_1) %>% summarise(first_dose = n())

d2c <- vcfd %>% mutate(day = ymd(ymd_hms(vacc_date_2))) %>% filter(vacc_type_2!="") %>% count(day, vaccine_name = vacc_type_2) %>% rename(second_dose = n)

dac <- d1c %>% left_join(d2c) 

smd <- expand.grid(day=ymd("2020-12-26")+days(0:as.integer(ymd(Sys.Date())-ymd("2020-12-26"))), vaccine_name = unique(dac$vaccine_name))

dac1 <- smd %>% left_join(dac) %>% mutate(first_dose = fixNA(first_dose),second_dose = fixNA(second_dose)) %>% mutate(used = first_dose+second_dose) %>% ungroup %>% group_by(vaccine_name) %>% mutate(cumulative_use = cumsum(used)) %>% ungroup

avdc <- dac1 %>% left_join(dlv) %>% 
    mutate(vaccines_arrived = fixNA(vaccines_arrived), vaccines_allocated = fixNA(vaccines_allocated)) %>% group_by(vaccine_name) %>% 
    mutate(arrived  = cumsum(vaccines_arrived),allocated = cumsum(vaccines_arrived)) %>% 
    ungroup %>% mutate(p = round(100*cumulative_use/allocated,2))



```

```{r}

ggplot(aes(x = day, y = p, colour = vaccine_name), data = avdc %>% filter(p<Inf)) + 
    geom_line() + theme_bw() + labs(y = "Procentai", x = "Data", title = "VakcinÅ³ sunaudojimo procentas Lietuvoje")+
    scale_colour_manual(name = "Vakcina", values = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(3, "Set1"))
```
